text: Tales of a worthy challenger have reached Harkon's ear! The Lord of the Blood Keep will see if there is any truth to this!
This cur has directly challenged us, let's not disappoint them, shall we.
We have heard of this one's skills, let us see if there is any merit to it.
These dogs hardly seem worth our time, alas I hunger for bloodshed.
This one proclaims to be the mightiest warrior, I will revel in his demise.
